review: This product was so easy to install and use, right out of the box. The video quality seems so much better than the previous way we viewed movies and TV shows, using Wii. The controller was elegant and straightforward. The voice command was flawless. My 12-year old loves the games! I highly recommend this product.

author: David R. Templeton "temple62"

review: We have had the Fire TV for about a month now. It is wonderful. I love the voice command option. We have an older Roku that we still use with an older TV but the Fire is so much better. I love that it cues up the next episode in a series. (maybe the newer Rokus do that, I don't know). Since I am a prime member the fire is a perfect fit. We mostly use Amazon Instant video and Netflix so we don't miss any of the stations the Roku offers. So glad I got this instead of another Roku.
